title: -15 LP on a win game GG RIOT
body: in my last game as Draven (ended 5-2-4) i lost 15 LP after winning, nice system u got here.

replies.body: Hey there, I looked into this for you but don't have good news to offer. :(  It looks like you were gone for long enough to be marked for leaving in that specific match.  Even if your team ends up winning, no credit is offered for leaving.  Sorry about that!

It appears you were AFK for a significant portion of that game. If you are AFK and receive a “Leaver” for the game, you lose LP as if you had lost, regardless of the outcome of the game, unless it is due to Riot server issues.
